name: Dagon's Awakening
overview: Dagon’s Awakening by Vintage Computing Carinththia was released physically in the limited edition Underwater Collection - Deluxe LED&Sound Cartridge. It had its first debut at Vintage Computing Carinthia $1F. In this game, you take on the role of a member of the Esoteric Order of Dagon who is on his way to perform a ritual to awaken Dagon, a giant ancient with a visage enough to drive mortals insane. The setting is inspired by the stories of H.P. Lovecraft and the game has several endings. Enjoy!
